description: On 4 November 1964, the founder of the Islamic Republic Ayatollah Ruhollah Khomeini better known as Imam Khomeini was secretly taken to Ankara and then to Bursa, Turkey. Almost a year later on 5 September 1965, he moved to the holy Iraqi city of Najaf and stayed there until Saddam Hussein pressured him to leave the country on 6 October 1978. He was exiled again by the pressure of Mohammad Reza Pahlavi to Neauphle-le-Château, Paris.
title: The day on which Imam Khomeini moved to France from Iraq

description: TEHRAN – Leader of the Islamic Revolution Ayatollah Seyyed Ali Khamenei has hailed the Iranian military’s Tuesday retaliatory attack against Israel as “brilliant”, noting that the attack dubbed Operation True Promise II was both “legal and legitimate”.
title: Brave hearts

description: TEHRAN – The Islamic Revolution Guard Corps (IRGC) has confirmed the martyrdom of Majid Divani, a military advisor from Khorramshahr, Iran, following an Israeli airstrike on Syria.
title: IRGC confirms martyrdom of military advisor in Israeli airstrike on Syria

description: TEHRAN – This is written for those unaware of history, the kind who, if they had lived during the Iraqi invasion of Iran, might have been fooled by Saddam’s deceptive rhetoric into aligning with him under the guise of "liberating" the country.
title: Netanyahu’s message to the people of Iran: a plan for a second Purim

description: TEHRAN-The play “Electra” written and directed by Mostafa Nasiri was performed at the 3rd International Theater Festival Abish Alemi, which was held in Aktau, Kazakhstan, from September 27 to 30.
title: Play from Mashhad staged in Kazakhstan

description: TEHRAN-The Iranian short animation “Piano” directed by Marjan Keshani and Shahab Shamsi won an award at the 5th Human Environment Care (HECare) Film Festival in Canada.
title: Short animation “Piano” wins top award at HECare Film Festival

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s foreign ministry spokesman has denounced Israel’s continued attacks against civilians in Lebanon, Gaza, and the West Bank, calling on the United Nations to finally take action to halt the regime’s aggression.
title: Iran says UN must intervene to stop growing Israeli aggression in West Asia

description: TEHRAN – The commander of the Iranian Army Ground Forces in Sistan and Baluchestan province says a border guard was killed in Zabul after a terrorist opened fire on him.
title: Terrorist liquidated after killing border guard in SE Iran

description: TEHRAN-Iranian theater director Behrouz Gharibpour will hold a masterclass titled “In-Depth Exploration of Puppet Theater” as part of the 20th Tehran-Mobarak International Puppet Theater Festival.
title: Tehran-Mobarak International Puppet Theater Festival to hold masterclass by Behrouz Gharibpour

description: TEHRAN – The sons of the Leader of the Islamic Revolution visited Lebanese citizens hospitalized in Tehran after they were injured in last month's Israeli attacks exploding thousands of communication devices.
title: Leader’s sons visit Israeli pager attack victims

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s deputy foreign minister for political affairs has called on the UN Security Council to implement stringent sanctions against Israel based on Chapter 7 of the UN Charter.
title: Tehran urges UNSC to impose ‘severe sanctions’ against Israel

description: TEHRAN- Hezbollah has continued its qualitative operations against the occupying regime, expanding its range of fire in northern Israel.
title: Hezbollah executes more quality operations

description: TEHRAN - Jam-e-Jam analyzed Operation True Promise II on Tuesday night that Iran fired about 200 ballistic missiles at Israeli military sites and spy centers.
title: The strategic dimension of True Promise II

description: BEIRUT – A year of some of the most heinous crimes by the arrogant West has passed; yet, the American Pharaoh persists in showing how brazen and hypocritical it is.
title: ‘Unite and resist’

description: TEHRAN-The Iranian animation “Kuzugiller” co-directed by Hossein Saffarzadegan and Meisam Hosseini has been released in cinemas in Turkey.
title: Turkish cinemas screening Iranian animation “Kuzugiller”

description: The umbrella group of resistance groups in Iraq said it launched projectiles against three targets in the occupied Golan Heights and Tiberias in Israel.
title: Islamic Resistance in Iraq fires drones at Israeli targets

description: TEHRAN- While global attention has been directed toward Israel’s fatal strikes in Lebanon, the regime’s atrocious crimes in the Gaza Strip and the West Bank go unchecked.
title: Triple tragedy: Israeli carnage continues unabated

description: TEHRAN- The Nasl-e Khalil ensemble, a Kurdish tanbur group, is scheduled to perform at Tehran’s Vahdat Hall on October 6.
title: Vahdat Hall to host Kurdish tanbur ensemble

description:
A collection of paintings by Tara Azarm is on display in an exhibition at Tarrahan Azad Gallery. 
The exhibition named “Fugue of Rebirth” will be running until October 15 at the gallery located at 5 Salmas Square, off Fatemi St.
title: What’s in Tehran art galleries

description: TEHRAN- Veteran Iranian film producer Jalil Shabani passed away in a Tehran hospital on Thursday due to complications from a brain ailment. He was 57.
title: Iranian film producer Jalil Shabani passes away

description: PORTLAND - Although the latest cycle of violence in the Middle East was initiated by Donald Trump at the behest of Israel’s Netanyahu in 2020, Netanyahu has taken it to a new level, endangering the lives of millions in the Middle East and around the world.
title: Is the U.S. a sovereign nation or a mute appendage of Israel?

description: TEHRAN - East Azarbaijan’s tourism chief has emphasized the growing importance of digital spaces in the tourism industry, stating that influencers have played a crucial role in showcasing the province’s historical and natural attractions.
title: Influencers help boost tourism development in East Azarbaijan

description: TEHRAN - A 5,000-year-old clay vessel has been discovered in Asadabad, a rural district of Hamadan province in western Iran.
title: 5,000-year-old earthen vessel discovered in western Iran

description: TEHRAN – Iran basketball club Tabiat discovered their fate in the highly-awaited 2024/25 FIBA West Asia Super League (FIBA WASL).
title: Iran’s Tabiat discover fate in 2024/25 FIBA WASL

description: TEHRAN - In the context of the 7th Joint Cooperation Meeting between Turkey’s border provinces and Iran’s West Azarbaijan, the governors-general of Iğdır, Ağrı, Van, and Hakkari provinces have visited their Iranian counterpart to discuss ways to expand ties.
title: Turkish border governors-general visit counterpart in northwest Iran

description: TEHRAN - In a significant step toward promoting tourism in Iran, the mayors of Yazd, Isfahan, and Shiraz have signed a trilateral cooperation agreement titled the “Golden Triangle of Iran's Tourism.”
title: Iran’s leading tourism cities sign cooperation agreement

description: TEHRAN - Mehdi Razmian became the latest Iranian winner in the World Taekwondo Junior Championships on day four in Chuncheon.
title: Razmian collects gold in World Taekwondo Junior Championships

description: A group of student volunteers took part in a plan to protect the livestock of tribes in the northeastern North Khorasan Province from diseases, especially foot-and-mouth disease.
title: Volunteers conduct livestock vaccination

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Araqchi made an unannounced visit to Beirut on Friday, as Israel continues to escalate its military operations across Lebanon with intensified air strikes and a failed ground offensive.
title: Iranian FM visits Beirut amid intensified Israeli strikes

description: TEHRAN –The Iranian Red Crescent Society (IRCS) has sent a consignment of relief items to people affected by recent Israeli attacks in Lebanon.
title: IRCS dispatches humanitarian aid to Lebanon

description: TEHRAN – The breast cancer awareness month (BCAM) is celebrated globally every October as part of a global effort to raise awareness on breast cancer, early detection, timely diagnosis, and treatment.
title: October, BCAM: no one should face cancer alone

description: TEHRAN – Iranian students won two silver medals at the International Innovation and Trade Expo (ITE 2024) which was held in London.
title: Iranian students win medals at intl. innovation, trade expo

description: TEHRAN - Iran's Deputy Agriculture Minister Safdar Niazi has said implementing smart irrigation systems in the country is going to reduce water consumption in the agricultural sector by 50 percent, IRNA reported.
title: Smart irrigation to reduce water consumption in agriculture by 50%

description: TEHRAN - The head of the Islamic Republic of Iran Shipping Lines (IRISL) has said developing and renovating the shipping fleet is a major priority of the company, IRIB reported.
title: ‘Fleet development, renovation, a major priority of IRISL’

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s Ports and Maritime Organization (PMO), in a recent report, has underlined the importance of the country’s maritime capacities and the role that the sector can play in developing the country’s economy.
title: PMO underlines importance of developing sea-oriented economy

description: TEHRAN - Iran’s car production increased by eight percent in the Iranian month of Shahrivar (August 21-September 21) as compared to the previous month, an industry ministry official said.
title: Iran’s monthly car output up 8%

description: TEHRAN - High-ranking officials from Iran and Qatar signed six cooperation documents in the fields of trade and economy, culture, education, sports, and agriculture.
title: Tehran, Doha ink new MOUs to expand ties in various fields

description: TEHRAN- China was Iran’s top trade partner in the first half of the current Iranian calendar year (March 20-Septemebr 22).
title: China, Iran’s top trade partner in H1

description: TEHRAN – Leader of the Islamic Revolution Ayatollah Seyyed Ali Khamenei told worshippers in Tehran on Friday that every nation, including the Palestinians and the Lebanese, has the right to defend against the aggressors, noting the Hamas attack on southern Israel on October 7 last year was "completely a right decision".
title: Leader: Iran's military action against Israel legal and legitimate

description: TEHRAN – Leader of the Islamic Revolution Ayatollah Ali Khamenei told worshippers in Tehran on Friday that every nation, including the Palestinians and the Lebanese, has the right to defend against the aggressors, noting the Hamas attack on southern Israel on October 7 last year was "completely a right decision".
title: Leader: Iran's military action against Israel was quite legal and legitimate

description: Lebanon’s Health Ministry said at least 37 people were killed, and over 150 were injured in Israeli strikes on Thursday, as the regime’s unrelenting aggression against Lebanon continues.
title: Hezbollah: Israel conducts 11 consecutive strikes in south Beirut
